description: Convert a 3-brick RGB (red, green, blue) data set to an HSL (hue, saturation, luminance) one.

in_vec.title: Input RGB Vector File
in_vec.description: Input RGB vector file of three bricks, presumably each having values in the interval [0,1].

mask.title: Mask File
mask.description: Whole brain mask within which to calculate things. Otherwise, data should be masked already.

in_scal.title: Input Scalar File
in_scal.description: Scalar file (single brick) which will be appended to the output file, mainly aimed at loading in an FA data set for tract volume coloration.
